wikipedia_page.main: Tim Davies (born 1959, Derbyshire, England) is a British pop art artist, currently living in Hanover, Germany. He is known for intensely colorful drawings nearly always depicting figures and often are related to music or dance. He designed CD covers for musicians like Al Di Meola, Robert Plant and Pink Floyd.

response: * Tim Davies (artist) (born 1960), Welsh artist with the artist group Beca
* Tim Davies (musician), Australian composer, orchestrator and musician
* Tim Davies (pop art artist) (born 1959), British pop art artist
* Tim Davies (racing driver), British Formula 3000 racing driver
